products.name: Tata Sampann Unpolished Toor Dal

products.long_description: Fortune Sunflower Oil is extracted from premium quality sunflower seeds. It is light in taste and has high smoke point making it ideal for Indian cooking styles including frying and sautÃ©ing.

products.name: Amul Taaza Homogenized Toned Milk
products.description: Fresh toned milk in tetra pack
products.long_description: Amul Taaza is homogenized toned milk packed in tetra pack to retain freshness. It is pasteurized and contains 3% fat and 8.5% SNF. Rich in calcium and vitamins.

products.name: Mtr Rava Idli Mix
products.long_description: MTR Rava Idli Mix is a convenient ready-to-make mix for soft and fluffy idlis. Just add water and steam. Contains rava, spices and other natural ingredients. No preservatives added.

products.name: Parle-G Glucose Biscuits
products.long_description: Parle-G has been India's most trusted biscuit brand for decades. These glucose biscuits provide instant energy and are perfect with tea or as a quick snack. Loved by all age groups.

products.name: Himalayan Pink Salt
products.long_description: Naturally mined from Himalayan mountains, this pink salt contains 84 essential minerals. It is unprocessed, unrefined and free from additives. Adds unique flavor to dishes.

products.name: Tata Tea Gold
products.long_description: Tata Tea Gold is a premium blend of finest Assam and Kenyan tea leaves. It gives rich aroma, bright color and refreshing taste. Perfect for morning tea.

products.name: Amul Taza
products.description: Fresh toned milk in a hygienic tetra pack, ideal for daily consumption. Rich in calcium and essential nutrients, perfect for tea, coffee, or drinking directly.
products.long_description: Amul Taaza Homogenized Toned Milk is a high-quality dairy product packed in a convenient tetra pack to ensure freshness and longer shelf life. It contains 3% fat and 8.5% SNF (Solids-Not-Fat), making it a healthy choice for everyday consumption. The milk is pasteurized and homogenized to provide uniform texture and taste. Rich in calcium, protein, and essential vitamins, Amul Taaza is perfect for drinking directly, preparing tea or coffee, and cooking traditional Indian dishes. Trusted by millions, it is a hygienic and nutritious option for your family's daily needs.

products.name: Sunfeast Bounce Biscuits
products.long_description: Sunfeast Bounce Biscuits are light, crispy, and perfect for tea-time snacks. Made with high-quality ingredients for a delightful taste.
